/faq.title: Sweet Handshake
p: What can I make with Handshake?

Each syrup we offer is a bit different. Some can be used in a seemingly infinite amount of ways, such as our vanilla flavor. Others, like our Lazy Trotter, are designed to make Mexican or Moscow Mules. We say get creative!
Do I need any special equipment to use the syrup?

/.title: Sweet Handshake
h1: It doesn't matter if it's hot or cold, just add Handshake to the beverage base of your choosing — espresso, gin, sparkling water — and enjoy.
h2: We make sweet liquid plants that create home-crafted drinks, giving you a 4x smaller carbon footprint.
It's time to ditch the can.
p: With the help of our earth rooted friends, we created a way to enjoy your favorite drinks — without compromising your health.

This powerful, plant-derived glycoside, is a natural sweetener with zero calories. It passes through our digestive system without being absorbed, delivering sweetness without spiking blood sugar levels.
Naturally found in raisins, figs, and jackfruit — Allulose is a rare sugar that isn’t metabolized by the body, meaning it wont mess with your blood sugar levels.
These miracle short-chain carbohydrates act as prebiotic fibers. They are indigestible by human enzymes, and instead promote the growth of beneficial gut bacteria.
Known for it’s perfect sweetness, we utilize a small amount of raw sugar to help create our beautifully rich and smooth flavor.
With Handshake, you decide how much to use.
Make it as sweet or subtle as you like.
Data is based on a single serving + equivalent ingredients.
How you use Handshake is entirely up to you.
Data is based on a single serving + equivalent ingredients. How you use Handshake is entirely up to you.
Yup! It's a syrup made entirely from plants!
